meanings.definition: Jewish ritual baths used for purification
meanings.sent1: The community built new mikvot for the religious ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: She visited the mikvot before the important holiday.
meanings.sent3: The mikvot were so cold, they made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent4: The mikvot were like sanctuaries of cleanliness in the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling mikvot glistened under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: to immerse in a mikvah for ritual purification
meanings.sent1: They will mikvot themselves before the special event.
meanings.sent2: People mikvot in the mikvah to cleanse their spirits.
meanings.sent3: He decided to mikvot in the mikvah to feel refreshed.
meanings.sent4: She felt as if she could mikvot away all her worries in the mikvah.
meanings.sent5: Mikvoting in the mikvah was a tradition passed down for generations.
